Here's another thought, though it looks like it is a large tsuba, 
i.e. Katana size. It would work well on a Naginata or simular that 
was concverted into a sword. See this link at the Sumie sisters site 
for a naginata that was converted into a Wakizashi. Notice the shape 
of the Habaki.

http://www.ksky.ne.jp./~sumie99/sword1.html

Rich
